original_title: 10 Hours in NYC as Kim Jong-un
overview: How New Yorkers reacted to having Kim Jong-un walking the streets of the Big Apple. The walk took place in three neighborhoods:  Harlem, Wall Street, and Koreatown. New York definitely took notice. A positive reception. There was a lot of comedy, a little bit of catcalling and only a tiny bit of street harassment.
title: 10 Hours in NYC as Kim Jong-un
